org.sakaiproject.taggable.api

Interface TaggingProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MatrixTaggingProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MatrixTaggingProviderImpl

    public interface TaggingProvider
    A provider of tagging capabilities for services that produce taggable activities.
    Author:
    The Sakai Foundation.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Method to copy tags from an activity being duplicated to it's duplicate, as happens when a context is duplicated (see EntityTransferrer.transferCopyEntities(String, String, java.util.List)).

    • Method Detail

      • allowViewTags

        boolean allowViewTags(String context)
        Method to check if current user is allowed to view tags. Generally, if this returns false the list returned by the getTags method will be empty.
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which to check permission.
        Returns:
        True if current user is allowed to view tags, false otherwise.

      • allowGetActivity

        boolean allowGetActivity(String activityRef,
                       String userId,
                       String taggedItem)
        Method to check if current user is allowed to look at particular activity
        Parameters:
        activityRef - Reference of the activity
        userId - Current user
        taggedItem - Reference of the related item that can be used for additional permission checking
        Returns:

      • allowGetItem

        boolean allowGetItem(String activityRef,
                   String itemRef,
                   String userId,
                   String taggedItem)
        Method to check if current user is allowed to look at a particular item
        Parameters:
        itemRef - Reference of the activity to which the item belongs
        itemRef - Reference of the item
        userId - Current user
        taggedItem - Reference of the related item that can be used for additional permission checking
        Returns:

      • allowGetItems

        boolean allowGetItems(String activityRef,
                    String[] itemRefs,
                    String userId,
                    String taggedItem)
        Method to check if current user is allowed to look at a particular list of items
        Parameters:
        itemRef - Reference of the activity to which the items belong
        itemRefs - List of references for a bunch of items (all items should belong to the same activity)
        userId - Current user
        taggedItem - Reference of the related item that can be used for additional permission checking
        Returns:

      • getActivityHelperInfo

        TaggingHelperInfo getActivityHelperInfo(String activityRef)
        Method to get the necessary data to invoke a helper tool for tagging the activity identified by the given ref.
        Parameters:
        activityRef - The reference to the activity that is to be tagged.
        Returns:
        An object containing the data to invoke the appropriate helper tool. Returns null if this is not supported or if the current user doesn't have permission to access the helper.

      • getActivityHelperInfo

        Map<String,TaggingHelperInfo> getActivityHelperInfo(String context,
                                                  List<String> activityRefs)
        Method to get the necessary data to invoke a helper tool for tagging the activity identified by the given ref.
        Parameters:
        activityRef - The reference to the activity that is to be tagged.
        Returns:
        An object containing the data to invoke the appropriate helper tool. Returns null if this is not supported or if the current user doesn't have permission to access the helper.

      • getItemsHelperInfo

        TaggingHelperInfo getItemsHelperInfo(String activityRef)
        Method to get the necessary data to invoke a helper tool for tagging items that belong to the given activity.
        Parameters:
        activityRef - The reference to the activity that contains the items to be tagged.
        Returns:
        An object containing the data to invoke the appropriate helper tool. Returns null if this is not supported or if the current user doesn't have permission to access the helper.

      • getItemHelperInfo

        TaggingHelperInfo getItemHelperInfo(String itemRef)
        Method to get the necessary data to invoke a helper tool for tagging the given item.
        Parameters:
        itemRef - The reference to the item that is to be tagged.
        Returns:
        An object containing the data to invoke the appropriate helper tool. Returns null if this is not supported or if the current user doesn't have permission to access the helper.

      • getTags

        TagList getTags(TaggableActivity activity)
        Returns a list of tags for the given activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - An activity that has been tagged.
        Returns:
        A list of tags for the given activity.
        See Also:
        TagList

      • getId

        String getId()
        Method to get a unique identifier for this provider.
        Returns:
        A unique identifier for this provider.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Method to get a displayable name for the provider. For example "Goal Management".
        Returns:
        A displayable name for this provider.

      • getSimpleTextLabel

        String getSimpleTextLabel()
        Method to get a displayable text label for the provider. For example "This item is linked to:"
        Returns:

      • getHelpLabel

        String getHelpLabel()
        Method to get a label for some help text
        Returns:

      • getHelpDescription

        String getHelpDescription()
        Method to get some descriptive help text
        Returns:

      • removeTags

        void removeTags(TaggableActivity activity)
                throws PermissionException
        Method to remove all tags from this activity. This method should check with the activity's producer using TaggableActivityProducer.allowRemoveTags(TaggableActivity) to make sure the user has permission to perform this action.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity from which to remove tags.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user is not allowed to remove tags from the given activity.

      • removeTags

        void removeTags(TaggableItem item)
                throws PermissionException
        Method to remove all tags from this item. This method should check with the item's producer using TaggableActivityProducer.allowRemoveTags(TaggableItem) to make sure the user has permission to perform this action.
        Parameters:
        item - The item from which to remove tags.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user is not allowed to remove tags from the given item.

      • transferCopyTags

        void transferCopyTags(TaggableActivity fromActivity,
                    TaggableActivity toActivity)
                      throws PermissionException
        Method to copy tags from an activity being duplicated to it's duplicate, as happens when a context is duplicated (see EntityTransferrer.transferCopyEntities(String, String, java.util.List)). This method should check with the activity's producer using TaggableActivityProducer.allowTransferCopyTags(TaggableActivity) to make sure the user has permission to perform this action.
        Parameters:
        fromActivity - The activity being duplicated from which to copy tags.
        toActivity - The duplicate activity to which to copy tags to.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user is not allowed to copy tags for the given activities.
